name: DALL-E Matcher
description:
This is a simple card-matching game with all graphical assets from the DALL-E Mini AI image generation algorithm which you can find online at craiyon.com. All the card images, card backs, and table backgrounds were generated by an AI artist.

You get score for matches and completing the game. Playing again after victory carries over your score, with a multiplying effect, so you can chase a high score ad infinitum!

---

Controls:

  • Mouse  - Point and click to match the cards.
  • R - Reset
  • M - Mute toggle

---

The game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 and the July 2022 One Game a Month Jam.
